commit.message:
combine.c (subst): Honour CLASS_CANNOT_CHANGE_SIZE when substituting the REG in a (subreg:X (reg:Y...

* combine.c (subst): Honour CLASS_CANNOT_CHANGE_SIZE when
substituting the REG in a (subreg:X (reg:Y ...)).

From-SVN: r34217
